name: Add a product to the shopping cart and validate that it is added correctly

testSteps.description: Given that Brayan is on the linio website

children.description: Brayan opens the browser on linio home page
Brayan opens the Linio home page

testSteps.description: When he add a product to the shopping cart

children.description: Brayan add a product to shopping cart on linio website
Brayan clicks on search text field in linio home page
Brayan enters 'Notebook Lenovo IdeaPad L340 Gaming, 15.6, Intel Core i5-9300H 2.4GHz, 8GB DDR4, 1TB SATA' into search text field in linio home page
Brayan clicks on search button in linio home page
Brayan clicks on product link notebook lenovo in linio
Brayan clicks on product link notebook lenovo in linio
Brayan clicks on product link notebook lenovo in linio

testSteps.description: Then he should see that the product was added successfully

exception.message:
Expected: "Notebook Lenovo IdeaPad L340 Gaming, 15.6, Intel Core i5-9300H 2.4GHz, 8GB DDR4, 1TB SATA"
     but: was "Notebook Lenovo IdeaPad L340 Gaming, 15.6\", Intel Core I5-9300H 2.4GHz, 8GB DDR4, 1TB SATA"

stackTrace.methodName: he should see that the product was added successfully
